name: Δ-Squad
description:
Use all your power to defend the city from the giant

Don't let her ruin your citizens lives.

Fly your fighter in the sky and give all your effort to  defeat her.Ally with the tanks and all the support you have.But be careful because you can fight against other enemie planes that the giant spawns in front of you.

HIT THE WEAK POINTS of the giant and she will die.

Controls are really simple,

ASWD /LEFT PAD to control de fighter

KEYBOARD ARROWS/RIGHT PAD to slide or speed

SPACE BAR/RIGHT TRIGGER to shoot

CONTROL/LEFT TRIGGER to zoom

F/R1 to shoot missile

CONTROL/L1 to change missile objective

The game was made by a group of 4 classmates for a jam in our class

INSTRUCTIONS TO INSTALL IT

1-Unzip the file

2-Open the .exe 

3-Enjoy as much as you can!!

This game is still in developement,but we will make some updates in the future.
